overview_summary: One neighboring household was profiled. Their stance on development is undetermined, and no clear advocacy for or against projects was found. Community influence appears low, with no high-profile roles or public statements identified.

neighbors.name: Daniel A. Smith & Katiann Smith
neighbors.claims: According to Mayes County assessor records, Daniel A. Smith and Katiann Smith jointly own a parcel of land in the county (PIN 490014865) [DataCrosspoint – Mayes Assessor](https://www.datacrosspoint.com/mayes-county-property-search/). No evidence was found of the Smiths taking any public stance on local development or serving in visible community positions [Mayes County Public Meetings](https://mayes.okcounties.org/meetings).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out personally via a mutual acquaintance or local community figure. Emphasize listening to their questions and openly addressing any concerns since their stance is unknown.
